definition: non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])

sentences.english: My beard and clothes are crusted with sand, my body is sore and aching.
sentences.chinese: 我的胡须和衣服上都是沙子，我的浑身酸痛。

sentences.english: So a note to remember, men with beards and mustaches need not apply where I am concerned!
sentences.chinese: 所以，留胡须的男人绝不会是我感兴趣的。

sentences.english: Some paleontologists argued that these whiskers were simple feathers.
sentences.chinese: 一些古生物学家这些胡须就是简单的羽毛。

sentences.english: His close-cropped beard lay like a shadow over his hollow cheeks .
sentences.chinese: 他剪短了的胡须如同阴影般笼罩在他凹陷的脸颊上。

sentences.english: The puff of white hair at the end of Swyft's chin quivered in outrage.
sentences.chinese: 斯威夫特下巴末端的胡须因为愤怒抖动着。

sentences.english: His beard fell to his chest.
His beard straggles because he hasn't shaven for a week.
sentences.chinese: 他的胡须蓬乱，他有一个星期没刮胡子了。

sentences.english: Facial hair can be fashionable, but it's probably best for men not to rock the ZZ Top look.
sentences.chinese: 胡子会很时尚，但是男人最好不要留Z字形胡须。

sentences.english: The men are heavily bearded and everyone has long hair.
sentences.chinese: 男人们满脸胡须，人人都是留着一头长发。

sentences.english: His 3)scraggly blonde beard kept more than his face warm.
sentences.chinese: 他那蓬乱的金色胡须让他整个人透出几分暖意。

sentences.english: His beard was not white like my beard but contained many black hairs.
sentences.chinese: 他的胡子不像我的白胡子，混有许多黑色胡须。

sentences.english: As internet mimes go this one is definitely the cat's whiskers.
sentences.chinese: 要说最新的网络模仿热潮，绝对非猫咪胡须照莫属。

sentences.english: Maybe a set of matching whiskers.
sentences.chinese: 也许是一副配套的脑波控制胡须吧。

sentences.english: You seem to me little more than a band of beardless children.
sentences.chinese: 你对我来说似乎多带胡须的儿童。

sentences.english: An auroch`s head is rather short but with a long beard.
sentences.chinese: 一头欧洲野牛的脑袋相当短小但胡须却很长。

sentences.english: In the Book of Judges, Samson loses his strength when his hair is cut.
sentences.chinese: 在士师记中，当萨姆森被割去胡须后就失去了力量。

definition: beard/mustache or whiskers/facial hair/CL:撮[zuo3],根[gen1]/(coll.) bandit
to hold sth long and run one's hand along it
to smooth or arrange sth using one's fingers/to stroke
variant of 絡腮鬍子|络腮胡子[luo4 sai1 hu2 zi5]
